text: Klubi Futbollistik Liria (), commonly known as Liria, is a professional football club based in Prizren, Kosovo. The club play in the First Football League of Kosovo, which is the second tier of football in the country. ==History== KF Liria is one of the oldest football clubs in Kosovo. They played in the Yugoslav lower leagues until the beginning of World War II, when the region was annexed by Albania. Liria, then renamed as Prizreni, participated for one season in the 1942 Albanian Superliga. After winning the North Zone, they qualified to the final stage of the tournament, where they lost in the semifinals against Tirana. After the end of the World War II, the club returned to the Yugoslav football league system, having played on a series of occasions in the Yugoslav Second League. After the Kosovo War, Liria began competing in the Football Superleague of Kosovo, the top tier of football in the Kosovo. KF Liria were the winners of the 2006–07 Kosovar Cup, beating Flamurtari 3–0 on penalties in the final held at Pristina City Stadium. KF Liria were the winners of the 2009–10 Kosovar Cup, beating Vëllaznimi 3–1 in extra time in Pristina City Stadium. Liria is the only club in Kosovo that have supporters almost in all the territory of the Kosovo, practically Liria is most supported club in Kosovo together with Prishtina. ==Honours== {| class="wikitable" width=100% style="text-align: center;font- size:100%;" |+KF Liria honours !scope=col|Type !scope=col|Competition !scope=col|Titles !scope=col|Seasons/Years |- |rowspan="3" |Domestic !scope=col|Football Superleague of Kosovo |align="center"|1 |1994–95 |- !scope=col|Kosovo Province League |align="center"|4 |1974–75, 1980–81, 1983–84, 1986–87 |- !scope=col|Kosovar Cup |align="center"|3 |1994–95, 2006–07, 2009–10 |- |} ==Players== ===Current squad=== ==Personnel== {| class="wikitable" width=40% style="text-align:left;font-size:100%;" |- !colspan="2"|Current technical staff |- !Position !Name |- |Head coach | Samuel Nikaj |- |Assistant coach | Rexhep Gaxholli |- |Goalkeeping coach | Blerim Zherka |- |Physiotherapist | Hysni Destani |- |Doctor | Fitim Badalli |- !colspan="2"|Board members |- !Office !Name |- |President | Ilijaz Ilijazi |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:Association football clubs established in 1930 Category:Football clubs in Yugoslavia Category:Football clubs in Kosovo
